channel.title: Music Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Music Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: SongGen: A Single Stage Auto-regressive Transformer for Text-to-Song Generation
item.description: SongGen: Single-stage autoregressive transformer for controllable text-to-song generation, simplifying the process and improving control.

item.title: XMusic: Towards a Generalized and Controllable Symbolic Music Generation Framework
item.description: XMusic: A new framework generates high-quality, emotionally controllable symbolic music from various prompts (images, videos, text, tags, humming).
